extends Object
implements ResourceDefinitionGenerator
    Base implemenation for generator.

      • generate

        public int generate(String relativeSubDir,
           String databaseName,
           String exclusionPattern)
             throws ResourceDefinitionGenerator.GenerationException
        Description copied from interface: ResourceDefinitionGenerator
        Creates resource definition files, one per table in the provided database.
        Specified by:
        generate in interface ResourceDefinitionGenerator
        Parameters:
        relativeSubDir - directory path relative to sql resources directory to create
        databaseName - database name
        exclusionPattern - table name pattern to exclude
        Returns:
        number of definitions created
        Throws:
        ResourceDefinitionGenerator.GenerationException - if a database access or file write error occurs

      • createDefs

        protected int createDefs(File subDirObj,
             String databaseName,
             String exclusionPattern)
                  throws ResourceDefinitionGenerator.GenerationException
        Creates resource definitions.
        Parameters:
        subDirObj - subdir file object
        databaseName - database name
        Returns:
        number of definitions created
        Throws:
        GenerationException - if a database access or file write error occurs
        ResourceDefinitionGenerator.GenerationException

      • getColumnsQuery

        protected abstract String getColumnsQuery()
        Hook method for implementation by db-specific classes. Must be preparable statement with single query param of the database name. Columns returned must be column name and then table name.

      • getTableExclusionQueryClause

        protected String getTableExclusionQueryClause()
        Returns query clause for a table name exclusion pattern.
